referenceObject.reference: Talwar, S., Majagi, S., Bodkhe, A. & Kamble, S. (2018). New report of genus Euryeidon Dankittipakul & Jocque 2004 from India (Araneae: Zodariidae) with description of two new species. In: Rao, P. N., Saxena, A., Pandey, B. N. & Kulkarni, G. K. (eds.) Biodiversity and bioprospects: Indian scenario and perspectives. Today & Tomorrow's Printers and Publishers, New Delhi, pp. 67-79.
